Movies.Name: Ant-Man and the Wasp
Movies.Overview: As Scott Lang balances being both a superhero and a father, Hope van Dyne and Dr. Hank Pym present an urgent new mission that finds the Ant-Man fighting alongside the Wasp to uncover secrets from their past.

Movies.Name: Wonder Woman
Movies.Overview: An Amazon princess comes to the world of Man in the grips of the First World War to confront the forces of evil and bring an end to human conflict.

Movies.Name: Spider-Man: Homecoming
Movies.Overview: Following the events of Captain America: Civil War, Peter Parker, with the help of his mentor Tony Stark, tries to balance his life as an ordinary high school student in Queens, New York City, with fighting crime as his superhero alter ego Spider-Man as a new threat, the Vulture, emerges.

Movies.Name: Thor: Ragnarok
Movies.Overview: Thor is on the other side of the universe and finds himself in a race against time to get back to Asgard to stop Ragnarok, the prophecy of destruction to his homeworld and the end of Asgardian civilization, at the hands of the ruthless Hela.

Movies.Title: Inception
Movies.Plot: A thief, who steals corporate secrets through use of dream-sharing technology, is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a CEO."

Movies.Title: Django Unchained
Movies.Plot: With the help of a German bounty hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal Mississippi plantation owner.

Movies.Title: The Revenant
Movies.Plot: A frontiersman on a fur trading expedition in the 1820s fights for survival after being mauled by a bear and left for dead by members of his own hunting team.

Movies.Title: The Departed
Movies.Plot: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in South Boston.

Movies.Title: Titanic
Movies.Plot: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.

Movies.Title: The Audition
Movies.Plot: A short film promoting the opening of Melco-Crown's movie-themed resort and casino in Macau.

Movies.Title: Gatsby
Movies.Plot: A writer and wall street trader, Nick, finds himself drawn to the past and lifestyle of his millionaire neighbor, Jay Gatsby.

Movies.Title: Shutter Island
Movies.Plot: In 1954, a U.S. marshal investigates the disappearance of a murderess who escaped from a hospital for the criminally insane.

Movies.Title: Blood Diamond
Movies.Plot: A fisherman, a smuggler, and a syndicate of businessmen match wits over the possession of a priceless diamond.

Movies.Title: Spotlight
Movies.Plot: The true story of how the Boston Globe uncovered the massive scandal of child molestation and cover-up within the local Catholic Archdiocese, shaking the entire Catholic Church to its core.

Movies.Title: Birdman
Movies.Plot: Illustrated upon the progress of his latest Broadway play, a former popular actor's struggle to cope with his current life as a wasted actor is shown.

Movies.Title: 12 Years As A Slave
Movies.Plot: In the antebellum United States, Solomon Northup, a free black man from upstate New York, is abducted and sold into slavery.

Movies.Title: Argo
Movies.Plot: Acting under the cover of a Hollywood producer scouting a location for a science fiction film, a CIA agent launches a dangerous operation to rescue six Americans in Tehran during the U.S. hostage crisis in Iran in 1980.

Movies.Title: The Artist
Movies.Plot: A silent movie star meets a young dancer, but the arrival of talking pictures sends their careers in opposite directions.

Movies.Title: The King's Speech
Movies.Plot: The story of King George VI of the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland, his impromptu ascension to the throne and the speech therapist who helped the unsure monarch become worthy of it.

Movies.Title: The Hurt Locker
Movies.Plot: During the Iraq War, a Sergeant recently assigned to an army bomb squad is put at odds with his squad mates due to his maverick way of handling his work.

Movies.Title: Slumdog Millionaire
Movies.Plot: A Mumbai teen reflects on his upbringing in the slums when he is accused of cheating on the Indian Version of "Who Wants to be a Millionaire?"

Movies.Title: No Country For Old Men
Movies.Plot: Violence and mayhem ensue after a hunter stumbles upon a drug deal gone wrong and more than two million dollars in cash near the Rio Grande.

Movies.Title: Blade Runner
Movies.Plot: A blade runner must pursue and try to terminate four replicants who stole a ship in space and have returned to Earth to find their creator.

Movies.Title: Back to the Future
Movies.Plot: Marty McFly, a 17-year-old high school student, is accidentally sent 30 years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his close friend, the maverick scientist Doc Brown.

Movies.Title: Back to the Future Part II
Movies.Plot: After visiting 2015, Marty McFly must repeat his visit to 1955 to prevent disastrous changes to 1985...without interfering with his first trip.

Movies.Title: Back to the Future Part III
Movies.Plot: Enjoying a peaceable existence in 1885, Doctor Emmet Brown is about to be killed by Buford "Mad Dog" Tannen. Marty McFly travels back in time to save his friend.

Movies.Title: The Terminator
Movies.Plot: A human-looking indestructible cyborg is sent from 2029 to 1984 to assassinate a waitress, whose unborn son will lead humanity in a war against the machines, while a soldier from that war is sent to protect her at all costs.

Movies.Title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day
Movies.Plot: A cyborg, identical to the one who failed to kill Sarah Connor, must now protect her ten year old son, John Connor, from a more advanced cyborg.

Movies.Title: Mad Max: Fury Road
Movies.Plot: A woman rebels against a tyrannical ruler in postapocalyptic Australia in search for her home-land with the help of a group of female prisoners, a psychotic worshipper, and a drifter named Max.

Movies.Title: The Martian
Movies.Plot: An astronaut becomes stranded on Mars after his team assume him dead, and must rely on his ingenuity to find a way to signal to Earth that he is alive.

Movies.Title: Limitless
Movies.Plot: With the help of a mysterious pill that enables the user to access 100 percent of his brain abilities, a struggling writer becomes a financial wizard, but it also puts him in a new world with lots of dangers.

Movies.Title: TRON: Legacy
Movies.Plot: The son of a virtual world designer goes looking for his father and ends up inside the digital world that his father designed. He meets his father's corrupted creation and a unique ally who was born inside the digital world.

Movies.Title: Gravity
Movies.Plot: A medical engineer and an astronaut work together to survive after an accident leaves them adrift in space.

Movies.Title: Oblivion
Movies.Plot: A veteran assigned to extract Earth's remaining resources begins to question what he knows about his mission and himself.

Movies.Title: Ghost In The Shell
Movies.Plot: A cyborg policewoman attempts to bring down a nefarious computer hacker.

Movies.Title: Elysium
Movies.Plot: In the year 2154, the very wealthy live on a man-made space station while the rest of the population resides on a ruined Earth. A man takes on a mission that could bring equality to the polarized worlds.

Movies.Title: Terminator Genisys
Movies.Plot: When John Connor, leader of the human resistance, sends Sgt. Kyle Reese back to 1984 to protect Sarah Connor and safeguard the future, an unexpected turn of events creates a fractured timeline.

Movies.Title: X-Men Origins: Wolverine
Movies.Plot: A look at Wolverine's early life, in particular his time with the government squad Team X and the impact it will have on his later years.

Movies.Title: Iron Man
Movies.Plot: After being held captive in an Afghan cave, billionaire engineer Tony Stark creates a unique weaponized suit of armor to fight evil.

Movies.Title: Iron Man 2
Movies.Plot: With the world now aware of his identity as Iron Man, Tony Stark must contend with both his declining health and a vengeful mad man with ties to his father's legacy.

Movies.Title: Iron Man 3
Movies.Plot: When Tony Stark's world is torn apart by a formidable terrorist called the Mandarin, he starts an odyssey of rebuilding and retribution.

Movies.Title: Fantastic 4
Movies.Plot: Four young outsiders teleport to an alternate and dangerous universe which alters their physical form in shocking ways. The four must learn to harness their new abilities and work together to save Earth from a former friend turned enemy.

Movies.Title: Hulk
Movies.Plot: Bruce Banner, a genetics researcher with a tragic past, suffers an accident that causes him to transform into a raging green monster when he gets angry.

Movies.Title: The Incredible Hulk
Movies.Plot: Bruce Banner, a scientist on the run from the U.S. Government, must find a cure for the monster he emerges whenever he loses his temper. However, Banner then must fight a soldier who unleashes himself as a threat stronger than he.

Movie.Title: Django Unchained
Movie.Plot: With the help of a German bounty hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal Mississippi plantation owner.
